/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The buildings in the background are tall and modern, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Streetlights and traffic lights punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of traffic. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image provides a glimpse into the bustling city life of Beijing, juxtaposed with the serene beauty of its natural surroundings.
